content:
From: Florian Haftmann <florian.haftmann@informatik.tu-muenchen.de>
The attached example illustrates how nested contexts and confined
interpretation allow constructions like »open interpretation«,
»pseudo-locales« or whatever you might want to call this.

Yet a further possibility to avoid low-level tinkering with foundational
locale lemmas using [OF …] and similar thing.

Florian
Locale_Foundational.thy
signature.asc

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Very good. The next time someone runs into problems with archaic [COMP]
(which has been discontinued already), we should point him here.

Makarius
